pageLevel.title: Rob Byrne: A Software Craftsman - Portfolio Site

content.lineOne: Crafting quality software in a variety of domains

highLevelSkills.subheader: Would you like a high-level overview or an in-depth look? Yes!

skills.title: Frontend & UX
skills.content: Building pixel-perfect web apps with intuitive UX. Exceptional experiences for amazing customers!

skills.title: Tooling for Devs
skills.content: I have built tooling for companies of all sizes to make developers more productive & empowered every day.

skills.title: Backend
skills.content: API's of all kinds! RESTful, GraphQL, NodeJS serverless functions, Ruby-on-Rails, event-based systems in Rust...

skills.title: DevOps
skills.content: Continuous delivery, continuous integration, continuous monitoring and always continuous improvement.

skills.title: Cloud Computing
skills.content: Deploying full-stack apps in Google Cloud Platform, Amazon AWS, Vercel, Heroku, and more.

skills.title: Commerce
skills.content: Building e-commerce solutions for companies of all sizes. Both eCommerce and Retail Commerce right in the store.

skills.title: Financial Technology
skills.content: Building performant and secure platforms that stand up to thorough scrutiny from regulatory agencies.

skills.title: Constant Improvement
skills.content: Getting a little better each day! Books, courses, articles, peers, pair programming, anything to improve.

skills.title: Professional Development
skills.content: Always becoming a better professional. Trading in direct, constructive feedback so that we all improve.

skills.title: Always taking notes
skills.content: In a real-life Moleskine notebooks, and digitally with markdown in Obsidian. I'm always adding to my second brain!

skills.title: Conscious Awareness
skills.content: Meditation is who I am not what I do. Always trying to find out more about who or what I am at the core.

skills.title: Life is good
skills.content: Living Each day to the fullest. Travelling, meditating swimming, golfing, hiking, yoga,  reading, gaming, concerts...

aboutThisSite.subheader: This site was made with some very cool, cutting edge technology! Check out more about them below...

items.title: It's a NextJS App!
items.content: Built using NextJS 12 with blazing-fast edge functions. With TypeScript because Javascript can us some help sometimes!

items.title: Static Site Generation (SSG)
items.content: HTML generated at build time. Better performance, security, and SEO built in for the modern web.

items.title: Styled Components
items.content: All styling accomplished with styled-components to have all CSS capabilities without a bunch of SASS files in the codebase.

languagesAndFrameworks.subheader:
So many tools, so little time. Which to choose? 
 Choose the right one for the job!
